title: The Dead Men
description: Librarian note: alternative-cover edition of B007JCCBHM."A twisted, thrill-a-minute zombie tale that grabs you by the throat and doesn't let go."Chris Collins has just escaped from the 'Zombie Zoo' in Tulsa, Oklahoma with The Dead Men - a cannibalistic, slave-trading motorcycle gang - in hot pursuit.Now he finds himself in Pagan, a ghost town in the Texas Panhandle, which has become a refuge from the zombie hordes. All Chris wants is to continue his quest to find his daughter. But when the Dead Men show up, he is forced to make a stand.But how can the vastly outnumbered citizens of Pagan stand up against the murderous bikers and their sadistic leader? Especially now that they're not even human any more.
author: J.J. Zep
